edu.uchsc.ccp.testing
Class TestSuite

java.lang.Object
  edu.uchsc.ccp.testing.TestSuite

public class TestSuite
extends java.lang.Object

A TestSuite is a set of tests designed to go with a particular Protege project. When the suite is run, each test is run individually and a summary of the results is generated.

Author:
R. James Firby

Method Summary

          Get the name assigned to this suite when it was created.

run

public boolean run(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                   boolean breakOnFail)
Run this TestSuite and print the results to the supplied stream.

Parameters:
stream - A stream to capture the test results from this run
breakOnFail - Stop if a failure occurs
Returns:
